description:
Luffy continues to move through the mysterious and dangerous woods, unaware of the danger that lurks in the trees! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his father as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Seafaring Kingdom! Germa`s King Judge!
Eine Seefahrernation! – Der erbarmungslose König Jajji!
Kaiyuu Kokka: Germa no Ou Judge
Une nation maritime. Judge, le roi de Germa
海遊国家 ジェルマの王ジャッジ
